bio: I'm an enthusiastic Computer Science student at VNRVJIET, passionate about learning and applying new technologies. I’m committed to continuous learning and innovation.

education.institution: VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology (VNRVJIET)

projects.title: Risk Analysis for Loan Default Prediction
projects.description: Developed a predictive model using Python, Flask, and ML algorithms to assess home credit loan default risk. Implemented feature engineering, EDA, and credit scoring. Deployed via Flask & Render for real-time predictions.

projects.title: Food Allergen Detection
projects.description: Created a Flask-based system using Python ML models to detect potential allergens from ingredient lists, providing real-time safety alerts for users.

projects.title: Sales and Marketing Analytics Dashboard – Power BI
projects.description: Designed a Power BI dashboard for Superstore & campaign data with KPIs like revenue, CAC, and CLV. Enabled strategic insights through interactive visuals.

internships.description: Built UI for loan default prediction system, improved integration, and authored detailed documentation to support team onboarding.
Collected cultural data through interviews across regions, covering food, traditions, festivals, and history.

certifications: Python for Everybody – University of Michigan (Coursera)
achievements: Offered FFE Scholarship for EAMCET rank 3217 and JEE MAINS 97.25 percentile
